task_10_in_progress.status: PR #43 open (draft) - 20 tests: enum logic + App navigation state. Next expansion: search state, stream filter, input mode transitions.
task_10_in_progress.notes: Draft PR #43 expanded this run with 10 navigation tests using App::new_for_test() helper (no new deps - uses SpoolContext::new with fake path, I/O errors silently ignored). 187 tests pass across workspace. Next: could add search_query tests (search_input, search_backspace, clear_search) and input_mode transition tests (start_new_task, start_new_stream) - these are also pure state mutations when search_mode/input_mode changes don't trigger reload_tasks... actually they DO call reload_tasks. Need to think whether those are feasible without filesystem.
